<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>true</before>
        <description>Makes the UX Form Actions Layout Item's Color column a dependent field.</description>
        <name>Action Layout Item Dependent Color</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[if (!pm.isZboot()) {
	var gr = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
	gr.addQuery("name", "sys_ux_form_action_layout_item");
	gr.addQuery("element", "color");
	gr.query();

	if (gr.next()) {
		gr.setValue("use_dependent_field", true);
		gr.setValue("dependent", "layout_group.type");
		gr.setValue("dependent_on_field", "layout_group.type");
		gr.update();
	}
}]]></script>
